\documentclass[border=5pt]{standalone}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\RequirePackage[semibold]{sourcesanspro}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepackage{xcolor}

\pgfplotsset{compat=1.18}

% Define colors
\definecolor{dotcolor}{HTML}{4169E1}
\definecolor{linecolor}{HTML}{DD0000}
\definecolor{textgray}{HTML}{404040}
\definecolor{gridgray}{HTML}{E8E8E8}

\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}

\begin{axis}[
    font=\footnotesize\sffamily,
    every tick label/.append style={font=\normalsize\sffamily\fontseries{sb}\selectfont, text=textgray},
    width=14cm,
    height=11cm,
    xmin=120,
    xmax=525,
    ymin=0,
    ymax=32,
    xtick={150,200,250,300,350,400,450,500},
    ytick={0,10,20,30},
    xticklabel style={font=\normalsize\sffamily\fontseries{sb}\selectfont, color=textgray, /pgf/number format/.cd, use comma, 1000 sep={}},
    yticklabel style={font=\normalsize\sffamily\fontseries{sb}\selectfont, color=textgray, /pgf/number format/.cd, use comma, 1000 sep={}},
    tick label style={font=\normalsize\sffamily\fontseries{sb}\selectfont, color=textgray},
    axis line style={gray!70, line width=0.5pt},
    tick style={gray!70},
    xmajorgrids=true,
    ymajorgrids=true,
    grid style={gridgray, line width=0.5pt},
    axis x line*=bottom,
    axis y line*=left,
    clip=false,
    set layers,
]

% Title
\node[anchor=south, font=\Large\sffamily, color=textgray] 
    at (rel axis cs:0.5,1.02) {\textbf{B\quad Runtime Scalability}};

\addplot[
    linecolor,
    line width=2.5pt,
    domain=130:515,
    samples=2,
] {0.041*x + 3.5};

    only marks,
    mark=*,
    mark size=2.2pt,
    draw=dotcolor!70!black,
    draw opacity=0.6,
    fill=dotcolor,
    fill opacity=0.5,
    on layer=axis background,
] coordinates {

    linecolor,

] {0.041*x + 3.5};
